issue.title: [Release] Post release task for updating the documentations
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7834](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7834). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Use the ubuntu-docs docker container to build the documentations and add a post-release script.
